initialize_harness.notes: System boots: PostgreSQL, migrations, seed data, API, and Vite frontend all working. Pre-existing test failures in TimelineCard.test.tsx noted.

claims_intake_flow.notes: Claims intake workflow with 6 injury types (musculoskeletal, psychological, soft tissue, fracture, neurological, occupational disease). Form validation with errors/warnings, required document tracking, risk assessment, next steps generation. Optional Freshdesk ticket creation. APIs: GET /api/intake/injury-types, GET /api/intake/template, POST /api/intake/validate, POST /api/intake/submit

certificate_ingestion_engine.notes: Certificate ingestion with OCR field extraction (dates, diagnosis, capacity, restrictions, hours), validation with confidence scoring, expiry tracking with alert levels. Supports WorkCover, medical, fitness, specialist, GP, allied health certificates. APIs: POST /api/certificates/extract, POST /api/certificates/ingest, POST /api/certificates/validate, GET /api/certificates/expiry-check

medical_flags_and_red_risk.notes: Added 5 new flag types: CERTIFICATE_EXPIRING_SOON, OVERDUE_FOLLOW_UP, WORKER_DISENGAGED, LONG_TAIL_CASE, PSYCHOLOGICAL_INJURY_MARKER. Enhanced UI to show all severity levels.

return_to_work_planner.notes: RTWPlan/RTWPlanPhase/RTWRecommendation types, generateRTWPlan service with phased progression templates, safety assessment, and recommendations. API: GET /api/cases/:id/rtw-plan

xgboost_prediction_layer.notes: XGBoost-style predictive analytics with case duration forecasting, RTW probability assessment, and deterioration risk scoring. Feature extraction from case data, confidence scoring, and feature importance explanations. Case priority rankings. APIs: GET /api/cases/:id/predictions, /api/cases/:id/predict/duration, /api/cases/:id/predict/rtw, /api/cases/:id/predict/deterioration, GET /api/predictions/rankings

freshdesk_ticket_mirroring.notes: Bidirectional Freshdesk integration: create/reply tickets, get conversations, webhook handling, high-risk email detection (suicide, threats, legal), bounce detection. APIs: GET/POST /api/freshdesk/tickets, /api/freshdesk/webhook, /api/cases/:id/communications, /api/freshdesk/analyze-risk

pinecone_rag_integration.notes: RAG knowledge service with vector embeddings, semantic search, and three-tier knowledge hierarchy (local→industry→global). Pre-populated with sample policies, clinical pathways, compliance guidelines. CRUD operations for documents, similarity search, case-specific knowledge retrieval. APIs: GET /api/knowledge/search, POST /api/knowledge/context, GET /api/knowledge/stats, GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/knowledge/documents, GET /api/cases/:id/knowledge

treatment_plan_generator.notes: Treatment plan generator with injury-based templates, treatment items (type, frequency, duration, provider, goals), milestones, short/long-term goals, and escalation triggers. API: GET /api/cases/:id/treatment-plan

timeline_and_recovery_estimator.notes: Recovery estimator service with injury categorization, benchmark comparisons, risk/positive factors, progress indicators, and recommendations. API: GET /api/cases/:id/recovery-estimate

provider_chat_workflow.notes: Provider communication templates for GP, specialist, physio, worker, insurer. Variable substitution, suggested communications based on case status. APIs: GET /api/provider-templates, POST /api/cases/:id/generate-message, GET /api/cases/:id/suggested-communications

weekly_checkin_engine.notes: Weekly check-in questionnaire with pain/mood/ADL/work categories. Score calculation, risk signal detection, trend analysis, and summary generation. APIs: GET /api/checkin/questions, POST /api/cases/:id/checkin, POST /api/checkin/:id/submit, GET /api/cases/:id/checkins

risk_dashboard.notes: Executive risk dashboard with API endpoint GET /api/dashboard/risk-summary. Aggregates risk breakdown, flag counts, urgent cases, and company risk metrics. RiskDashboard.tsx UI with auto-refresh every 60s.

claimant_profile_summary.notes: Comprehensive worker profile service with status snapshot, medical summary, recovery progress, active flags, engagement metrics. API: GET /api/cases/:id/profile. WorkerProfileCard.tsx UI component.

unit_tests.notes: Unit tests for claimsIntake (19 tests), certificateIngestion (24 tests), weeklyCheckin (25 tests). Tests cover form validation, OCR extraction, work capacity detection, risk signals, score calculations, and trend analysis. 68 new tests total.

e2e_tests.notes: Playwright E2E tests: api-endpoints.spec.ts (Knowledge Base, Intake, Certificate, Check-in, Provider APIs), case-management.spec.ts (UI tests for case list, detail panel, navigation, error handling). Extends existing gpnet-dashboard.spec.ts.

deployment_pipeline.notes: Docker containerization (Dockerfile, Dockerfile.dev), Docker Compose with postgres/app/dev profiles, GitHub Actions CI/CD (.github/workflows/ci.yml) with lint/test/build/deploy stages, DEPLOY.md documentation, .env.example template.

behaviour_sentiment_engine.notes: Worker behaviour and sentiment pattern engine. Analyzes worker interactions (email, checkin, interview, appointment) for sentiment trends and engagement patterns. Detects distress language, frustration, legal threats. Calculates engagement metrics (responsiveness, attendance, communication volume). Generates behaviour flags with severity levels and suggested actions. APIs: GET /api/cases/:id/behaviour, POST /api/sentiment/analyze, POST /api/cases/:id/interactions, GET /api/behaviour/rankings, GET /api/cases/:id/engagement

evidence_documents_engine.notes: Evidence and document management engine. Supports 13 document types (certificates, reports, statements, clinical notes). Features: upload with virus scanning, version control, metadata management, full-text search, document linking to cases/workers, expiry tracking, access logging for audit trails. APIs: GET /api/documents/types, /api/documents/stats, /api/documents/expiring, /api/documents/search, POST /api/documents/upload, GET/PUT/DELETE /api/documents/:id, POST /api/documents/:id/version, /api/documents/:id/link, PUT /api/documents/:id/status, GET /api/documents/:id/access-logs, GET /api/cases/:id/documents

regulatory_audit_engine.notes: Comprehensive audit trail and compliance engine. Logs authentication events, case modifications, RTW plan changes, certificate actions, communications, and automation executions. Tracks who/what/when/why for all changes. Compliance checks for certificates, RTW plans, contact frequency, incident reports. Export to JSON/CSV with configurable retention policies. APIs: GET /api/audit/stats, /api/audit/retention-policies, /api/audit/events, POST /api/audit/events, /api/audit/export, GET /api/cases/:id/audit-trail, /api/cases/:id/compliance, POST /api/cases/:id/compliance/run

smart_summary_engine.notes: Smart case summary engine synthesizing timeline, certificates, check-ins, communications, risk signals, and RTW status. Generates case snapshots with headlines, urgency levels, key points, recommended actions (prioritized), and executive summaries. Supports full/snapshot/brief/stakeholder/handover summary types. Batch summaries with aggregate statistics. Change detection between summaries. APIs: GET /api/cases/:id/summary, /api/cases/:id/snapshot, /api/cases/:id/actions, POST /api/summary/generate, GET /api/summary/batch

liability_decision_engine.notes: Liability assessment engine analyzing evidence for work-relatedness and compensability. Analyzes injury details, work conditions, documentary evidence, worker history, and behavioural factors. Outputs likelihood assessment (likely_compensable, unlikely_compensable, unclear_needs_investigation) with confidence scores, detailed rationale, evidence gaps, and recommended actions. Quick check for simplified assessment. Audit trail integration. APIs: GET /api/cases/:id/liability, POST /api/liability/assess, POST /api/liability/quick-check, GET /api/liability/sample-evidence
